author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania, export +0,3% su mese, import +1,4% a dicembre Macroeconomia
text: BERLIN, Feb 8 (Reuters) - Germany's Federal Statistics Office on Thursday reported the following preliminary economic data. Figures are in billions of euros : GERMAN TRADE (ADJUSTED) DEC 17 NOV 17 DEC 16 Trade balance 21.4 22.3 18.7 Exports 111.9 111.5 101.4 Exports pct change m/m 0.3 4.1 -1.8 Imports 90.4 89.2 82.7 Imports pct change m/m 1.4 2.2 0.3 GERMAN TRADE (UNADJUSTED) DEC 17 NOV 17 DEC 16 Trade balance 18.2 23.7 18.3 Current account 27.8 27.2 24.9 Exports 100.9 116.4 97.1 Imports 82.7 92.7 78.8 Goods 18.6 25.1 16.8 Services 3.6 0.2 1.7 Primary income 10.7 7.2 10.3 Secondary income -5.0 -5.3 -4.0 GERMAN TRADE (UNADJUSTED) JAN-DEC 17 JAN-DEC 16 Trade balance 244.9 248.9 Current account 257.1 259.3 Exports 1,279.4 1,203.8 Imports 1,034.6 954.9 Goods 266.7 268.4 Services -18.0 -21.2 Primary income 60.6 52.1 Secondary income -52.3 -40.0 (Reporting by Berlin Newsroom) nS8N1PA00S
